page.title: 02Revills Coaches,Langtoft
page.content: {Revills Coaches}are on Sledmere Road, Langtoft.The coaches are very useful since they are in Langtoft.They have fourteen coaches,two midi and four mini buses.They also have four freezer wagons.There are also two coaches being scrapped which can be used for spares.There are roughly fourteen staff for Revills Coaches. Three of whom are mechanics.One of whom is the manager and two whom are the owners. All employees are drivers. They do a lot of jobs for the schools around the area.They do a lot of jobs for our school in Langtoft. Revills Coaches take children from Langtoft to Driffield Secondary School.They do alot of jobs for Twydales a nationwide turkey producer.The buses are white with a brown and orange stripe.The buses seat 38 & 42 people.The mini buses seat 12 people.
